alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Itasca; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 2:44PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Itasca and west central St. Louis Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 244 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chisholm, or 9 miles north of Hibbing, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hibbing around 250 PM CDT. Chisholm around 300 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Buhl. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North Itasca; South Itasca
